A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I felt Arian Johnson did a tremendous job in bringing the saga back to its center after Abrams felt it necessary to  put in 50 gazillion things that needed to be figured out.

Hamill's performance as an old hermit who felt scorned by the force was incredible.

Most of the reviews I hear of people who didn't like it were fanboys mad that Johnson didn't take the story in directions they wanted or answer questions the way they wanted them answered.
